site_name: Vulcan WharfCooks RoadStratfordLondonE15
description: Formal Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and County Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) (England and Wales) Regulations 2017 (as amended) in respect of a full planning application for the proposed redevelopment of the site to include a mixed-use scheme, including residential space comprising approximately 500 residential units, and a range of employment generating uses including approximately 6,100m2 Gross Initial Area (GIA) last mile logistics (B8), 2,850 m2 GIA light industrial (B1c), 185m2 GIA restaurant/caf√ö (A1/A3) along with servicing/carpark facilities, ancillary space and associated landscaping.
